articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Progressive US lawmaker Omar faces censure over mistranslated speech - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Omar, a Somali American Congress member, says the attacks are the latest instance of hardline Republican ‘Islamophobia’.
articles.content:
Washington, DC A new Republican firestorm has ignited around United States Congress member Ilhan Omar this time over alleged statements she made during a speech to Somali Americans.
The only problem… [+4629 chars]
